scripts.dev:
docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.local.yml up -d --remove-orphans && echo '
Start server and client with commands:

  pnpm --filter @cpn-console/server run dev
  pnpm --filter @cpn-console/client run dev

Make sure you provide env variables in `.env` files.'
scripts.docker:dev: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --remove-orphans; docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml watch --no-up & docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml logs server client -f
scripts.docker:e2e: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up ${TAG:+--no-build} -d --remove-orphans; turbo run test:e2e --filter=@cpn-console/client --color --no-daemon; docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml down --remove-orphans
scripts.docker:e2e-ci: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.prod.yml up ${TAG:+--no-build} -d --remove-orphans; turbo run test:e2e-ci --filter=@cpn-console/client --color --no-daemon
scripts.docker:integ: docker compose --env-file apps/server/.env.integ -f ./docker/docker-compose.integ.yml up -d; docker compose --env-file apps/server/.env.integ -f ./docker/docker-compose.integ.yml watch --no-up & docker compose --env-file apps/server/.env.integ -f ./docker/docker-compose.integ.yml logs server client -f
scripts.docker:integ:build: export $(cat apps/server/.env.integ | grep -v '#' | xargs) && export COMPOSE_FILE=./docker/docker-compose.integ.yml && cd $(dirname $COMPOSE_FILE) && docker buildx bake --file $(basename $COMPOSE_FILE) --load && cd - > /dev/null
scripts.integ:
docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.local.yml up -d --remove-orphans postgres pgadmin && echo '
Start server and client with commands:

  pnpm --filter @cpn-console/server run integ
  pnpm --filter @cpn-console/client run integ

Make sure you provide env variables in `.env.integ` files.'
scripts.kube:e2e: pnpm kube:dev; npm --prefix apps/client run kube:e2e
scripts.test:ct: pnpm --filter @cpn-console/shared run build && pnpm --filter @cpn-console/test-utils run build && pnpm --filter @cpn-console/client run test:ct
